      • unprotectedSetQuota

        static INodeDirectory unprotectedSetQuota(FSDirectory fsd,
                                 String src,
                                 long nsQuota,
                                 long ssQuota,
                                 org.apache.hadoop.fs.StorageType type)
                                   throws FileNotFoundException,
                                          org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathIsNotDirectoryException,
                                          QuotaExceededException,
                                          org.apache.hadoop.fs.UnresolvedLinkException,
                                          SnapshotAccessControlException,
                                          UnsupportedActionException
        See ClientProtocol.setQuota(String, long, long, StorageType) for the contract. Sets quota for for a directory.
        Returns:
        INodeDirectory if any of the quotas have changed. null otherwise.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if the path does not exist.
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathIsNotDirectoryException - if the path is not a directory.
        QuotaExceededException - if the directory tree size is greater than the given quota
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.UnresolvedLinkException - if a symlink is encountered in src.
        SnapshotAccessControlException - if path is in RO snapshot
        UnsupportedActionException

      • unprotectedSetReplication
